name: Oatmeal with Fruit and Seeds
instruction: Cook the oats with water or almond milk according to package instructions. Top with diced apple, chia seeds, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Veggie Omelette
instruction: Whisk the eggs and pour into a heated non-stick pan. Add spinach, bell peppers, and onions. Cook until eggs are set. Top with avocado slices.

name: Smoothie Bowl
instruction: Blend the berries, banana, spinach, and almond milk until smooth. Pour into a bowl and top with granola, nuts, and seeds.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
instruction: Combine quinoa, black beans, corn, cherry tomatoes, and red onion in a bowl. Toss with olive oil, lime juice, salt, and pepper.

name: Turkey and Veggie Wrap
instruction: Spread hummus on the tortilla, then layer with turkey, avocado, spinach, and carrots. Roll up and slice in half.

name: Lentil Soup
instruction: Sauté garlic, carrots, and celery in a pot. Add diced tomatoes, lentils, vegetable broth, and thyme. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Stir-Fried Tofu and Vegetables
instruction: Sauté tofu in sesame oil until golden brown. Add vegetables and ginger, and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce and cook for another minute.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instruction: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Cook ground turkey or beef and mix with cooked rice and diced tomatoes. Stuff the mixture into bell pepper halves and bake for 20-25 minutes. Top with cheese if desired.

name: Baked Chicken with Sweet Potatoes
instruction: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Toss sweet potato cubes with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Place chicken breast on a baking sheet and season with the same spices. Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and sweet potatoes are tender

name: Protein-Packed Smoothie
instruction: Blend all ingredients until smooth and serve.

name: Overnight Oats
instruction: Mix all ingredients in a bowl or jar, refrigerate overnight, and add honey or maple syrup before serving.

name: Whole Grain Toast with Avocado and Eggs
instruction: Toast the bread, mash avocado and spread it on top, cook the eggs to your preference, place them on the toast, and top with cherry tomatoes, salt, and pepper.

name: Grilled Chicken and Quinoa Bowl
instruction: Combine all ingredients in a bowl, toss with olive oil and lime juice, and serve.

name: Turkey and Sweet Potato Skillet
instruction: Sauté ground turkey, sweet potato, spinach, and bell peppers in olive oil with paprika, salt, and pepper until cooked through.

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
instruction: Mix tuna with Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, celery, and red onion, spread on whole-grain bread, and top with leafy greens.

name: Beef Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
instruction: Stir-fry beef with vegetables in sesame oil, add soy sauce or tamari, and serve over brown rice.

name: Baked Salmon with Quinoa and Asparagus
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried herbs (like dill or rosemary)
instruction: Bake salmon with olive oil, herbs, salt, and pepper at 180°C (350°F) for 15-20 minutes, and serve with quinoa and steamed asparagus.

name: Chicken and Vegetable Curry
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, peas)
instruction: Cook chicken and vegetables in olive oil, add coconut milk and curry powder, simmer until done, and serve with basmati rice.

name: Egg White and Veggie Scramble
instruction: Sauté vegetables in olive oil, add egg whites, and cook until scrambled, seasoning with salt and pepper.

name: Greek Yogurt with Almonds and Berries
instruction: Top Greek yogurt with berries, almonds, and chia seeds.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instruction: Combine all ingredients in a bowl, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.

name: Turkey and Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
instruction: Mix ground turkey with cooked quinoa and diced tomatoes, stuff into bell peppers, bake at 180°C (350°F) for 25 minutes, and top with cheese if desired.

name: Baked Salmon with Steamed Broccoli
instruction: Bake salmon at 180°C (350°F) for 15-20 minutes with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper, and serve with steamed broccoli.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry with Vegetables
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, snap peas, carrots)
instruction: Stir-fry chicken with vegetables in olive oil, add soy sauce and ginger, and cook until done.

name: Lentil and Vegetable Soup
instruction: Combine all ingredients in a pot, simmer until vegetables are tender, and season with salt and pepper.
